reporter-output.line:
T Given user is on flipkart homepage
P Expected: a string containing "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles, Fashion, Books, Electronics, Home Appliances and More" Actual: was "Online Shopping Site for Mobiles, Fashion, Books, Electronics, Home Appliances and More" [View Screenshot]
T When user selects product 'Smart & Ultra HD' from 'TVs & Appliances' category
T Then user should see product results
P Expected: a value greater than <0> Actual: <24> was greater than <0> [View Screenshot]
T When user select sortby 'Price -- High to Low'
T And user select filterby 'Vu' brand
T Then user should see only product results
P Expected: not <110> Actual: was <10> [View Screenshot]
T When user selects '0' product from product list
P Expected: <true> Actual: was <true> [View Screenshot]
T Then user should see product details matching correctly
P Expected: a string containing "Vu 189cm (75 inch) Ultra HD (4K) QLED Smart TV" Actual: was "Vu 189cm (75 inch) Ultra HD (4K) QLED Smart TV (H75K800)" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "₹3,19,999" Actual: was "₹3,19,999" [View Screenshot]
T When user selects view details
P Expected: <true> Actual: was <true> [View Screenshot]
T Then user should see 'flipkart assured'
P Expected: <true> Actual: was <true> [View Screenshot]
T When user selects add to cart
T Then product has been added to the cart
P Expected: a value greater than <0> Actual: <1> was greater than <0> [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "Vu 189cm (75 inch) Ultra HD (4K) QLED Smart TV" Actual: was "Vu 189cm (75 inch) Ultra HD (4K) QLED Smart TV" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "₹3,19,999" Actual: was "₹3,19,999" [View Screenshot]
